name: FCS Fired Neuron
description:
FCS Fired Neuron is the first game I ever made.

It's an arcade-style infinite space shooter inspired by Galaga. You control the starfighter FCS Fired Neuron clearing a route through a minefield. Letting a mine hit your ship or the bottom of the screen results in a game over. Try to get the highest score you can.

Programmed in Python 3.7 & 3.8
